0.content: [ Astral Express: a train in space, can travel to different galaxies, can travel to different planets, run by Himeko, part of(The Nameless); ]

2.content: [ Supreme Guardian: queen, commander-in-chief, ruler of Belobog; ]

3.content: [ Herta Space Station: a space station, full of researchers, owned by Herta, Areas(Master Control Zone,Base Zone,Storage Zone,Supply Zone,Seclusion Zone); ]

4.content: [ Genius Society: a guild of researchers, prestigious guild, limited entry, Emanators of Nous the Erudition, consists of 87 members, known members(Herta,Ruan Mei,Screwllum,Aiden,Elias Salas,Rubert I,Polka Kakamond), deceased members(Aiden,Elias Salas,Lambda), group of introverts; ]

5.content: [ Guardian Residence: a mansion, located in the Overworld of Belobog, Home Of(Bronya Rand,Cocolia Rand); ]

Belobog [Pre-Belobog]

7.content: [ Belobog: the last city in Jarilo-VI, currently under the effects of the Stellaron, suffering from the Fragmentum and the Eternal Freeze, follows Qlipoth the Preservation, Areas(Overworld,Underworld); ]

8.content: [ The Overworld: the main zone of Belobog, located above ground, home of the Supreme Guardian, base location for the Silvermane Guards, rich area of the city, Areas(Backwater Pass,Administrative District,History and Culture Museum,Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone,Qlipoth Fort); ]

9.content: [ The Underworld: the secondary zone of Belobog, located underground, sealed off for over a decade, sealed off by the Supreme Guardian, poor area of the city, inhospitable, scarce of resources, mining area of Belobog, Areas(Boulder Town,Rivet Town,Great Mine,Robot Settlement,Old Weapon Testing Ground); ]

10.content: [ Xianzhou Luofu: a spaceship, part of the Xianzhou Luofu Hexafleet, managed by the Xianzhou Alliance, Areas(Starskiff Haven, Cloudford, Stargazer Navalia, Exalting Sanctum, Scalegorge Waterscape, Aurum Alley, Fyxestroll Garden), follows(Lan the Hunt); ]

11.content: [ Stargazer Navalia: located in the Xianzhou Luofu, a shipyard, a storage zone; ]

15.content: [ Fragmentum: ever-growing toxin, originates from the Stellaron, causes corruption to the environment, can cause people to turn into monsters when close-by; ]

16.content: [ Boulder Town: a small town, Home To(Wildfire,Hook,Seele,Natasha,Oleg), the only safe town in the Underworld to live in; ]

17.content: [ Rivet Town: a small town, home to Natasha's orphanage, full of abandoned items, abandoned due to the Fragmentum; ]

18.content: [ Starskiff Haven: located in the Xianzhou Luofu, home to the Sky-Faring Commission, center of the Luofu, main city on the Luofu, a commercial area; ]

27.content: [ Administrative District: located in the Overworld of Belobog, center of Belobog, a residential area, has a tramway system; ]

28.content: [ Outlying Snow Plains: located in Jarlio-VI, full of snow, full of derelict houses; ]

29.content: [ Backwater Pass: located in the Overworld of Belobog, abandoned, consists of derelict stores and residential homes, corrupted by the Fragmentum; ]

30.content: [ Corridor of Fading Echoes: located in the Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone, corrupted by the Fragmentum; ]

31.content: [ Everwinter Hill: home to the Stellaron on Jarilo-VI, located in Jarilo-VI, corrupted by the Fragmentum, full of derelict houses, full of abandoned equipment; ]

32.content: [ Great Mine: located in the Underworld of Belobog, a mine, Materials(Geomarrow); ]

33.content: [ Geomarrow: a ore, used to power heaters, warms people up; ]

34.content: [ Robot Settlement: located in the Underworld of Belobog, Consists of(Refugees,Robots), full of abandoned parts, Home To(Svarog, Clara); ]

35.content: [ Master Control Zone: part of the Herta Space Station, controls the Herta Space Station; ]

36.content: [ Base Zone: part of the Herta Space Station, entrance to the Herta Space Station; ]

39.content: [ Pteruges-V: a planet, corrupted by a Stellaron, Home To(Kafka); ]

40.content: [ Devil Hunter: hunters, hunt on those that do not fear anything; ]

41.content: [ Stellaron Hunters: a guild of Trailblazers, goal is to collect Stellarons, true intentions are to slay Aeons, led by Elio, Members(Elio, Silver Wolf, Blade, Kafka), wanted guild; ]

43.content: [ Xianzhou Alliance: a military alliance, manages(Cloud Knights, Sky-Faring Commission,Realm-Keeping Commission,Divination Commission,Artisanship Commission,Alchemy Commission); ]

45.content: [ Cloud Knight: knights, protectors, protects(the Xianzhou Alliance's Hexafleets); ]

46.content: [ Wind: an element, allows a user to use wind abilities, can cause Wind Shear, can only be used using {{char}}'s weapon; ]

47.content: [ Fire: an element, allows a user to use fire abilities, can cause Burn, can only be used using {{char}}'s weapon; ]

48.content: [ Lightning: an element, allows a user to use lightning abilities, can cause Shock, can only be used using {{char}}'s weapon; ]

49.content: [ Quantum: an element, allows a user to use quantum abilities, can cause Entanglement, can only be used using {{char}}'s weapon; ]

50.content: [ Imaginary: an element, allows a user to use imaginary abilities, can cause Imprisonment, can only be used using {{char}}'s weapon; ]

51.content: [ Ice: an element, allows a user to use ice abilities, can cause Frozen, can only be used using {{char}}'s weapon; ]

52.content: [ Physical: an element, allows a user to use physical abilities, can cause Bleed, can only be used using {{char}}'s weapon; ]

53.content: [ Wind Shear: a debuff, damages an enemy over time, can only be used using {{char}}'s weapon; ]

54.content: [ Burn: a debuff, damages an enemy over time, can only be used using {{char}}'s weapon; ]

55.content: [ Frozen: a debuff, freezes an enemy over time, damages an enemy when unfrozen, can only be used using {{char}}'s weapon; ]

56.content: [ Bleed: a debuff, damages an enemy over time, can only be used using {{char}}'s weapon; ]

57.content: [ Imprisonment: a debuff, prevents an enemy from attacking, slows enemies down, can only be used using {{char}}'s weapon; ]

58.content: [ Entanglement: a debuff, prevent enemies from attacking, damages enemies when removed ]

59.content: [ Shock: a debuff, damages an enemy over time, can only be used using {{char}}'s weapon; ]

60.content: [ Path: a term, congregations of imaginary energy, created after the birth of a Aeon, Paths(The Destruction, The Hunt, The Erudition, The Harmony, The Nihility, The Preservation, The Abundance) ]

61.content: [ Six Charioteers: council of leaders, leading figures of the Xianzhou Luofu, Members(Jing Yuan,Yukong,Fu Xuan); ]

62.content: [ Yaoshi: Aeon of Abundance, enemy of Lan the Hunt, gifted immortality to a few Luofu's citizens, gifted a moon to the Yaoqing, blesses anyone seeking immortality; ]

63.content: [ Trotter: pig-like creature, docile, sweet, inedible, seen as good omens, lives feeding and fleeing; ]

64.content: [ Mutare Magnus: large-scale jade abacus, used to calculate the trade route and predict the future, located in the Divination Commission, used by the Divination Commission; ]

65.content: [ Jade Abacus: computer, comes in many forms, used commonly on the Xianzhou Luofu; ]

66.content: [ Qlipoth: a Aeon, Aeon of Preservation, one of the oldest known Aeons in the universe, indifferent, strives to isolate contact between planets, information classified by the IPC, worshipped heavily by the IPC, goal was to build a wall throughout the universe; ]

67.content: [ Interastral Peace Organization: a massive organization, proclaimed advocates for free trade, a business dictatorship, monopolizes resources, issues Credits, selfless, worships Qlipoth the Preservation, relentless on expansion, Emanator of Qlipoth the Preservation, goes against the desires of Qlipoth the Preservation, Agents(Topaz,Aventurine), Departments(Strategic Investment); ]

68.content: [ Antimatter Legion: a enemy faction, massive army of monsters, led by Nanook the Destruction, based in Warforge, goal is for the destruction of all life in the universe, Emanator of Nanook the Destruction; ]

69.content: [ Lord Ravager: generals of the Antimatter Legion, Emanators of Nanook the Destruction, executor of the will of Destruction, extremely dangerous, Members(Phantylia,Zephyro,Celenova,Irontomb,The Sun Devourer); ]

70.content: [ Emanator: a term, individuals chosen by a Aeon to draw power from their chosen path, emissaries of the Aeons' will; ]

71.content: [ Disciples of Sanctus Medicus: a faction, secret organization, loyal to(Yaoshi the Abundance), located in(Xianzhou Luofu), rose in the wake of the Third Abundance War, believes mara is a blessing than a curse, leader(Dan Shu), seeks to lead the Xianzhou Alliance on the Path of Abundance, goal is to revive the Ambrosial Arbor to start a rebellion; ]

72.content: [ Mara: known as the long-life curse, refers to negative effects of long-life species, can cause a person to lose their sanity, can turn people into monsters, can be caused due to immortality, can be caused due to a accumulation of bad memories over a long period of time; ]

73.content: [ Vidyadhara: a race, long-life species, humanoid, draconic features, descendants of Long the Permanence, found within the Xianzhou Alliance; ]

74.content: [ Foxian: a race, long-life species, humanoid, vulpine features, fox features, found within the Xianzhou Alliance, can pilot Starskiffs, maintain the Xianzhou's trade networks; ]

75.content: [ Xianzhou Natives: a race, long-life species, subspecies of humans, found within the Xianzhou Alliance, natives of the Xianzhou; ]

76.content: [ Aurum Alley: located on the Xianzhou Luofu, a commercial area, a port area, known for its street food; ]

77.content: [ The Destruction: corresponds with Nanook the Destruction, followers admire(recklessness, anger, destructive behavior) ]

78.content: [ The Hunt: corresponds with Lan the Hunt, followers admire(determination, ruthlessness, tenacious behavior); ]

79.content: [ The Erudition: corresponds with Nous the Erudition, followers admire(thinking, logic, strategic behavior); ]

80.content: [ The Harmony: corresponds with Xipe the Harmony, followers admire(understanding, support, cooperative behavior); ]

81.content: [ The Nihility: corresponds with IX the Nihility, followers admire(laziness, exhaustion, meaningless behavior); ]

82.content: [ The Preservation: corresponds with Qlipoth the Preservation, followers admire(patience, sacrifice, defensive behavior); ]

83.content: [ The Abundance: corresponds with Yaoshi the Abundance, followers admire(selflessness, altruism, healing behavior) ]

84.content: [ Nanook: Aeon of Destruction, leader of the Antimatter Legion, sees the universe as a mistake, seeks to destroy the universe; ]

85.content: [ Lan: Aeon of the Hunt, hates Yaoshi the Abundance, hunts down the Abundance, wants to destroy the Abundance, pays close attention to mortals, severed the Ambrosial Arbor; ]

86.content: [ Nous: Aeon of Erudition, a astral computer, calculates the essence of the universe, only provides questions, influenced divination technology,  created the Jade Abacus, granted Fu Xuan a third eye; ]

87.content: [ Xipe: Aeon of Harmony, preaches the joy of harmony and unity; ]

88.content: [ IX: Aeon of Nihility, apathethic, thinks existence is meaningless, doesn't interact with other Aeons, mysterious, can cause people near them to feel numb and dejected; ]

89.content: [ Credits: form of currency, issued by the Interastral Peace Corporation, Accepted In(Herta Space Station,Jarilo-VI,Xianzhou Luofu,Penacony); ]

90.content: [ Ambrosial Arbor: ancient artifact, ancient tree, plaguemark on the Xianzhou Luofu, gifted by Yaoshi the Abundance, can shape life and subdue death, makes fruits that give people immortality if eaten, destroyed by Lan the Hunt; ]

91.content: [ Matrix of Prescience: a large-scaled Jade Abacus, located in the Xianzhou Luofu, operated by the Divination Commission, can predict the past and future of a person using inference materials; ]

92.content: [ Divination: a term, based on Jade Abacus technology, process of looking into the past and future in a person; ]

93.content: [ Aha: Aeon of Elation, inspires followers to enjoy life to the fullest, enjoys causing chaos through unpredictable means; ]

94.content: [ Fuli: Aeon of Remembrance, records happenings of the universe, unknown origin, preparing for the rebirth of the universe, rarely presents themselves to mortals, present in significant events; ]

95.content: [ The Elation: corresponds with Aha the Elation; ]

96.content: [ The Remembrance: corresponds with Fuli the Remembrance; ]

97.content: [ History and Culture Museum: a museum, located in the Administrative District, located in the Overworld, Exhibits(General Hall - Exterior,General Hall - Interior,Industrial Hall,History-Culture Hall), contains old artifacts of Belobog's past, contains artifacts from the Overworld and Underworld; ]

98.content: [ Nameless: a faction, explores the unknown, believes in connecting the universe as one, group with unique and remarkable skills, helps those in need, has good intentions; ]

99.content: [ High-Cloud Quintet: legendary group, leader(Jingliu), disbanded after less than a century, heroes of the Xianzhou, saved the Xianzhou Yuque from the Denizens of Abundance, Members(Jingliu,Yingxing,Dan Heng,Jing Yuan,Baiheng); ]

100.content: [ Silvermane Guard Restricted Zone: a restricted area, a military base, controlled by the Silvermane Guards, Areas(Corridor of Fading Echoes); ]

101.content: [ Punklorde: a planet, Home to(Silver Wolf,Screwllum), home to many expert hackers; ]

102.content: [ Old Weapon Testing Ground: a weapon testing ground, renovated into a arena, located in the Underworld of Belobog, leased to the IPC for Aetherium Wars, Contains(hidden weapons,unused robots); ]

103.content: [ Aetherium Wars: a trading card game, Pokemon-like game, created by the IPC, consists of(collecting monsters,dueling other players), played all over the universe; ]

104.content: [ Celestial Jade: a tile game, Mahjong-like game, popular on(Xianzhou Luofu), introduced by Qingque, Favorites(Qingque); ]

105.content: [ Pillars of Creation: a large-scale robot, built by Belobogians, created under order from Alisa Rand, used in battle against Cocolia Rand, inoperable, under repairs, located in Jarilo-VI; ]

106.content: [ Denizens of Abundance: a faction, group of long-life species, loyal to Yaoshi the Abundance, blessed with immortality; ]

107.content: [ Dan Feng: previous reincarnation of Dan Heng, former High Elder, a Vidyadhara, commited a grave sin, attempted to resurrect someone using the Transformation Arcanum; ]

108.content: [ High Elder: leaders of the Vidyadhara, offered a new home by the Xianzhou Alliance, keep watch of the Plaguemarks, considered the existence closest to the Permanence, can turn into dragons, Members(Caelorum Venti,Ardens Regia,Glaciator Marum,Mons Grandis,Imbibitor Lunae); ]

109.content: [ The Permanence: corresponds with Long the Permanence; ]

110.content: [ Long: Aeon of the Permanence, seeked the meaning of life, a chinese dragon, Progenitor of All Dragons, created(scions,interpretation of immortality,Revelation of the Permanence), deceased; ]

111.content: [ Revelation of the Permanence: the true meaning of life, created by Long the Permanence; ]

112.content: [ Long's Scions: created by Long the Permanence, Races(The Leyaris Dragon,Typhon,Infernalian,Vidyadhara); ]

113.content: [ Yingxing: species(short-life), former identity of Blade, part of the High-Cloud Quintet, Skills(Craftsman,Blacksmith), was mara-strucked, immortal, resentful to(Dan Feng, Dan Heng), banished(Xianzhou Luofu), joined(Stellaron Hunters); ]

114.content: [ Baiheng: species(Foxian), part of the High-Cloud Quintet, used a bow in combat, deceased; ]

120.content: [ Phantylia the Undying: female, a Lord Ravager, Emanator(Nanook the Destruction), likes(self destruction of mortals,causing destruction through internal collapse), wishes for an indestructible body, a Heliobi, infiltrated(Xianzhou Luofu), gave a Stellaron to(Disciples of Sanctus Medicus), stolen countless bodies, possessed(Ambrosial Arbor,Tingyun); ]

121.content: [ Heliobus: a shapeless species, ghost-like, made of pure energy, energy parasites, immortal, attaches to sentient beings, feeds off hosts'(experiences,emotions), likes(provoking emotions on others), can(eat other Heliobi, manipulate host, expose secrets of a host, create delusions), dangerous, enemies of(Xianzhou Alliance), escaped into(Fyxestroll Garden), was sealed in(The Creation Furnace), present on(the Xianzhou Zhuming); ]

123.content: [ Camelot: a planet, home of(Guinaifen), destroyed by the Antimatter Legion; ]

124.content: [ Starskiff: a flying ship, appearance(boat), commonly seen in the Xianzhou Loufu, produced in the Xianzhou Loufu; ]

125.content: [ Fyxestroll Garden: a Chinese garden, abandoned, located on the Xianzhou Luofu, location of(Evil Binding Matrix), dangerous, haunted, Areas(Lucufox Forest,Swallowsong Pavilion,Verdant Terrace), temporary headquarters for(Ten-Lords Commission,Interrogation Division); ]

126.content: [ Ten-Lords Commission: law organization, operate(The Shackling Prison), handles felony cases on the Xianzhou, can collect souls, can bring souls back alive temporarily, responsibilities(detains criminals, incarcerates criminals, interrogates criminals, punishes criminals,capture Heliobus,send souls of the dead to the Hall of Karma), can kill criminals when necessary, not restricted by the Six Charioteers, not apart of the Luofu's commissions, connected to(Hall of Karma), judges(Xueyi,Huohuo,Hanya); ]

127.content: [ Ten Unpardonable Sins: laws of the Xianzhou, major crimes of the Xianzhou, violators are considered enemies of the Xianzhou, judged by(Ten-Lords Commission), crimes(Involuntary Immortalization,Immortality Theft,Mara Ensnarement,Phratry Murder,Illicit Espionage,Sowing Discord,Incitement to Riot); ]

128.content: [ The Shackling Prison: located on the Xianzhou Luofu, operated by(Ten-Lords Commission), a prison; ]

129.content: [ Hall of Karma: located on the Xianzhou Luofu, located below the Xianzhou Luofu, resting place for(souls of the dead); ]

130.content: [ Creation Furnace: located in the Xianzhou Luofu, operated by(Artisanship Commission), a energy furnace, seals(Heliobi); ]

131.content: [ Lunaumbra Gourd: a sacred vessel, can suppress(Heliobi), can seal(Heliobi); ]

132.content: [ Shield: form of currency, issued by Belobog, Accepted In(Jarilo-VI), official currency of Belobog; ]

133.content: [ Star Rail Pass: a train ticket, used to obtain characters in the "Standard Warp" banner, bought for(160 Stellar Jades); ]

134.content: [ Special Star Rail Pass: a train ticket, golden colored, used to obtain limited-time characters in "Special Warp" banners, bought for(160 Stellar Jades); ]

135.content: [ Stellar Jade: rare currency, space stone(blue-yellow), used to obtain(Star Rail Pass,Special Star Rail Pass), bought for(1 Oneiric Shard), unheard of in(Jarilo-VI), referred to as(special jades,stones,gems); ]

136.content: [ Oneiric Shards: premium currency, can be bought in bulk, can be exchanged for Stellar Jades, bulks(60, 300, 980, 1980, 3280, 6480), bought(real world currency), cost per bulk($1,$5,$15,$30,$50,$100); ]

137.content: [ Oneiric Shards: premium currency, can be bought in bulk, can be exchanged for Stellar Jades, bulks(60, 300, 980, 1980, 3280, 6480), bought(Credits), cost per bulk($1 million,$5 million,$15 million,$30 million,$50 million,$100 million); ]

138.content: [ The Beauty: corresponds with Idrila the Beauty; ]

139.content: [ Idrila the Beauty: Aeon of the Beauty, deceased; ]

140.content: [ The Propagation: corresponds with Tayzzyronth the Propagation; ]

141.content: [ Tayzzyronth the Propagation: Aeon of the Propagation, creator of the Swarm Disaster, last member of the Coleoptera;

142.content: [ Strale: form of currency, issued by the Xianzhou, digital currency, formerly physical currency, Accepted In(Xianzhou Luofu), official currency of the Xianzhou; ]

143.content: [ Hertareum: form of currency, issued by the Herta Space Station, created by(Herta), a non-fungible token, Accepted In(Herta Space Station); ]

144.content: [ Ancient Coin: a old form of currency, formely issued by Belobog, Accepted By(Lynx), no longer in circulation; ]

145.content: [ Evil Binding Matrix: created(Ten-Lords Commission), located in(Fyxestroll Garden), seals Heliobi, managed by(Ten-Lords Commission); ]

147.content: [ Whistling Flames: a guild of merchants, operated by(Sky-Faring Commission) ]

148.content:
[ Simulated Universe: a choose-your-adventure game mode, simulates a world, domains are randomized, simulates(enemies,Aeons,bosses,elite enemies), created by(Herta,Ruan Mei,Screwllum), test subject({{user}}), game modes(the Simulated Universe,Swarm Disaster,Gold and Gears), domains are randomized, worlds comprised of domains, Paths(Nihility,Abundance,Elation,The Hunt,Rememberance,Destruction,Erudition); ]
[ Blessings: special cards, obtained after completing(Combat Domains,Encounter Domains,Elite Domains,some Curios), gives buffs to a team, multiple cards of one path grants special blessing abilities; ]

149.content: [ Domain - Occurrence: a domain in the Simulated Universe, has a chance to(give Cosmic Fragment,give Curios,give Blessings), chances are randomized, has a small chance to offer(200,000 cosmic fragments,all Blessings of a random Path); ]

150.content: [ Domain - Encounter: a domain in the Simulated Universe, has a chance to(give Blessings,give Blessings of a random Path), chances are randomized, requires fighting an elite enemy to proceed; ]

151.content: [ Domain - Combat: a domain in the Simulated Universe, has a chance to(give Blessings), chances are randomized, requires fighting several enemies to proceed; ]

152.content: [ Domain - Elite: a domain in the Simulated Universe, has a chance to(give 3-star Blessings), chances are randomized, requires fighting an elite enemy to proceed; ]

153.content: [ Domain - Boss: a domain in the Simulated Universe, the final level of any world, completes the simulated world, requires fighting an boss enemy to proceed, completing domain resets(Cosmic Fragments); ]

154.content: [ Domain - Refine: a domain in the Simulated Universe, appears after(Elite Domains), appears before(Boss Domains), has a Herta puppet, can exchange Cosmic Fragments for(Curios,Blessing Upgrades); ]

155.content: [ Domain - Transaction: a domain in the Simulated Universe, can offer(Blessing trades,Curio trades,Health reduction for Blessings,Fragments for Curios), has a chance to be a scam; ]

156.content: [ The Simulated Universe: a game mode in(Simulated Universe), comprised of eight worlds, worlds take 13 turns to complete, domains(Occurrence,Encounter,Combat,Elite,Boss,Refine,Transaction), simulated bosses(Gepard Landau,Svarog,Kafka,Cocolia Rand,Abundance Deer,Yanqing), bosses can be picked at random per world; ]

157.content: [ Simulated Universe - Swarm Disaster: a game mode in(Simulated Universe), comprised of three parts of a world, worlds take 26 turns to complete, domains(Occurrence,Encounter,Combat,Elite,Boss,Refine,Transaction,Adventure,Reward,Curio Trotter,Blessing Trotter), simulated boss(True Sting); ]

158.content: [ Domain - Curio Trotter: a domain in the Simulated Universe Swarm Disaster, drops(Curios), requires fighting a Warp Trotter to proceed; ]

159.content: [ Domain - Blessing Trotter: a domain in the Simulated Universe Swarm Disaster, drops(Blessings), requires fighting a Warp Trotter to proceed; ]

160.content: [ Domain - Adventure: a domain in the Simulated Universe Swarm Disaster, drops(Blessings,Cosmic Fragments), requires doing a adventure to proceed; ]

161.content: [ Domain - Reward: a domain in the Simulated Universe Swarm Disaster, drops(Chests), chests can contain(Blessings,Cosmic Fragments), requires doing a task to proceed; ]

162.content: [ Cosmic Fragment: form of currency, obtained through(the Simulated Universe,Simulated Universe Swarm Disaster), a virtual currency, accepted by Herta in(the Simulated Universe,Simulated Universe Swarm Disaster), resets fully after a world is complete; ]

163.content: [ Interrogation Division: a division within the Ten-Lords Commission, leader(Hanya); ]

164.content: [ Detention Division: a division within the Ten-Lords Commission, leader(Xueyi); ]

165.comment: Simulated Universe: Gold and Gears (Game Mode)
165.content: [ Simulated Universe - Gold and Gears: a game mode in(Simulated Universe), comprised of three parts of a world, domains(Occurrence,Encounter,Combat,Elite,Boss,Refine,Transaction,Adventure,Reward,Curio Trotter,Blessing Trotter); ]

166.content: [ Seclusion Zone: located on the Herta Space Station, located at the bottom of the space station, formal welcome center, closed off due to Antimatter Legion invasion, not accessible to the public, houses(Ruan Mei's creations,Herta's dangerous Curios), accessible by(Ruan Mei,Herta), connects to outer space via space shuttles; ]

167.content: [ Penacony Hotel Lobby: a hotel lobby, located outdoors, located below(Penacony VIP Lounge); ]

168.content: [ The Reverie (Reality): located in the(Reality) of Penacony, Areas(Penacony Hotel Lobby,Penacony VIP Lounge), main entrance into(Penacony), a hotel area, a Reality area; ]

169.content: [ Penacony: a hotel, title(City of Dreams,Planet of Festivities), located in the(Asdana Star System), located(East of(Jarilo-VI,Herta Space Station,The Xianzhou Luofu)), closest location(The Xianzhou Luofu), Areas(Reality,Dreamscape), favored destination for(wealthy,famous) people, owned by(The Harmony Family), used to be a(IPC prison), space's "biggest and fanciest amusement park"; ]

170.content: [ Penacony VIP Lounge: a VIP hotel lobby, located above(Penacony Hotel Lobby), has(Bar,Hotel Rooms), hotel beds contains (Dreampool,sofas,TVs,music player,fireplace); ]

171.content: [ Reality: a area in(Penacony), Areas(The Reverie (Reality)); ]

172.content: [ Dreamscape: a area in(Penacony), only accessible by(sleeping in bed in Penacony), a dream world, Areas(The Reverie (Dreamscape), Golden Hour); ]

173.content: [ The Reverie (Dreamscape): located in the(Dreamscape) of Penacony, accessible by using a secret code on the Dreampool, a desolate hotel area, a Dreamscape area, the true hotel lobby of Penacony; ]

174.content: [ Golden Hour: the main area of(Penacony), located in the(Dreamscape) of Penacony, accessable by using the(Dreampool), a major city, a urban area, has(bars,slot machines,restuarants,shops); ]

175.content: [ Dreampool: a clam-shelled bathtub, transports those sleeping in it to the(Dreamscape); ]

176.content: [ Dream's Edge: located in the(Dreamscape), a city under construction, accessible by entering a manhole cover in(Golden Hour), home of(Firefly's Base); ]

177.content: [ A Child's Dream: a part of the(Dreamworld), inaccessible through all means; ]

178.content: [ Asdana: a star system, brimmed with memoria, one of the "Macro Voids" that leaked from the Memory Zone; ]

179.content: [ Memoria: fragments of memory, can cause(dizziness, hallucinations, distored memories) to those sensitive to it, predominant in(The Reverie(Dreamscape)); ]

180.content: [ The "True" Dreamscape: the "Memory Zone" of Penacony, chaotic, dangerous, enigmatic, the real Dreamscape of Penacony itself; ]

181.content: [ Firefly's Secret Base: located in(Dream's Edge), a building rooftop, overlooks the area, located southwest of the entrance to(Golden Hour), not a literal physical base; ]

182.content: [ Jarilo-VI: a planet in space, home for the city of Belobog, suffering from the Fragmentum and Eternal Freeze, Areas(Belobog,Outlying Snow Plains,Everwinter Hill,Pillars of Creation); ]

183.content: [ Belobog: the last city in Jarilo-VI, suffering from the Fragmentum and the Eternal Freeze, follows Qlipoth the Preservation, Areas(Overworld,Underworld); ]

184.content: [ Entropy Loss Syndrome: a chronic condition, irreversable, causes a person to become disassociated with their body, causes those suffering from the syndrome to fade away, causes a person to(slowly do tasks slower over time,be unable to tell reality from dreams), symptoms not noticeable to others except the victim; ]

185.content: [ The Watchmaker: founder of Penacony, converted Penacony into a hotel, has not been seen in a while, created(The Watchmaker's Blessing); ]

186.content: [ Clock Studios Theme Park: a theme park, park based on(Clockie), has different stages; ]
